description: Try our easy to follow Low-Fat Creamy Mushroom & Ham Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: LowFat Creamy Mushroom & Ham Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g premium shaved leg ham 97% fat free

recipeInstructions.text: Cook penne in a large pan of rapidly boiling, salted water until just tender. Drain and return to pan.

Spray a nonstick frying pan with olive oil cooking spray. Heat over medium heat. Add mushrooms and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring often, until golden and all liquid has evaporated. Add shallots and cook for 1 minute, stirring until well combined.
Sprinkle cornflour over mixture. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Bring to the boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 1 minute. Stir through ham.
Pour sauce over pasta. Toss until well combined. Serve sprinkled with parmesan.
